FROM centos:6

RUN yum install -y curl && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

RUN yum install -y tar which && rm -rf /var/cache/yum

# Install rvm
RUN gpg --batch --keyserver hkp://keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 409B6B1796C275462A1703113804BB82D39DC0E3
# Running the installation twice to work around docker issue when using overlay.
# https://github.com/docker/docker/issues/10180
RUN ( curl -f -sSL https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --ruby) || ( curl -f -sSL https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --ruby)

RUN /bin/bash -l -c "echo '. /etc/profile.d/rvm.sh' >> ~/.bashrc"
RUN /bin/bash -l -c "gem install --update bundler"
